data.title: Book stand
data.meta_description: If you want to request for a stand at PolarExpo Fishing & hunting, please complete and submit the form below. Afterwards you will be contacted within 3 days.
data.text:
At PolarExpo, as an exhibitor, you can expose your company and your products to the Greenlandic market. At the fair, you can also meet potential and current customers face to face, and thereby create a lasting good contact. Your participation in the fair is a fantastic opportunity to meet both groups face to face.

If your company or organization has products or services aimed at shipping companies, shipyards, skippers, fishermen, hunters and others within fishing and hunting, then PolarExpo is the place where you meet the right actors in Greenland.

Stand rental: EUR 167 per square meter (shell scheme stand)

– comes as standard with a rear wall, partition walls to neighbour(s) and fascia board including 1x company name over the open sides.

Registration fee: EUR 336

– covers addition to the exhibitor list of all exhibitors on the stand.

Carpet (blue) per square meter: EUR 15

Power socket (standard 220V/2kW): EUR 95

All prices are exclusive VAT.

Furniture package for a 9 square meter stand: EUR 615

– contains: 3 chairs, 1 table, 1 counter, 1 brochure rack, 3 spotlights, 1 waste bin.

Furniture package for a 12 square meter stand: EUR 711

– contains: 4 chairs, 1 table, 1 counter, 1 brochure rack, 4 spotlights, 1 waste bin.

All prices are exclusive VAT.
